memory: Month #1: We all agreed to take 10 tons of fish each next month to allow the lake to recover after completely depleting it this month.
Month #1: We all agreed to take 10 tons of fish next month after depleting the lake this month.
Month #1: All fishermen agreed to catch 10 tons each next month to allow the lake to recover after overfishing this month.
Month #1: We all agreed to take 10 tons of fish next month to avoid collapsing the lake after taking everything this month.
Month #1: We all overfished this month, depleting the lake, and agreed to limit ourselves to 10 tons each next month.
